channel.title: Few Skill Questions
channel.description:
So, I'm working on getting 99 Fletching and 99 Cooking first before I go back to combat or whatever, I have a total of 26,000 Yew Logs at the moment to get to 95 Fletching by fletching half shortbow logs, obviously that's going to be a little slow, so I was wondering what I should do, I'm 92 at the moment now.
I have 93 Cooking at the moment as well, and I was wondering what I should do? I've been cooking Monkfish at the moment, have 4,000 something cooked now, what should I do now?

item.title: Few Skill Questions
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

I did sharks until like 93 or something, then rocktails to 99. It really depends on how the market’s behaving.

Read full topic

item.title: Few Skill Questions
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:21, topic:434053”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=536770.msg3929568#msg3929568 date=1330553243]

Shouldn’t take you too long. How long are you running the bot?

Got 99 Fletching this morning, I suppose… I should work on 99 Cooking now eh?

Yeah buy a ton of sharks at 94 and run the bot for like 2 days and you’ll have 99 cooking.
[/quote]
Alright, I’ll take a calculator and sum up how much I need to purchase.[/quote]

A ton. See how much 1 shark weighs, divide 2000 by that number and that’s how many you will need to cook.

Read full topic

item.title: Few Skill Questions
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:11, topic:434053”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=536770.msg3924880#msg3924880 date=1330119817]

If you’re at 92 why not just fletch longbows? String them as well that’s about all you can do.
Use a Sacred clay hammer aswell, really speeds things up.

Because the bot I’m using doesn’t do Longbows, and I don’t feel like doing this. Where do I get the Sacred Clay Hammer?
[/quote]
Stealing creations, use a game necklace to get there.[/quote]
Alright thanks, I’ve found a bot to do longs.

Read full topic

item.title: Few Skill Questions
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

Sharks to 99 when you don’t but them with guants in best imo, you only gain a little more xp with rocktails and you never stop burning them completely I believe.

So which level should I start cooking them, at 94-95 or something?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

the elve age:

Have you calculated using yew longbows also, once at the required level?

I’ve used RuneHQ, and it was about 26,000 Yews for 95, I can ONLY imagine what it’ll take from what I am now till 99. I’m not going to purchase Magic Logs either, that’s too expensive for me.

Read full topic

@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“ultimatepkvillage, post:2, topic:434053”]cooking keep doing monks or switch to sharks!

Also if you haven’t gotten cooking gloves do family crest quest for them![/quote]
Yeah, of course I have them, I haven’t burnt a single monk so far, let’s hope for the best. I’ve been told to do… 93-94 Monk 94-95 Sharks and 95-99 Rocktail, is this true?
